thread.title: Identity Theft Insurance Quotes Added to Nationwide Database at Insurance Website Online
thread.title_full: Identity Theft Insurance Quotes Added to Nationwide Database at Insurance Website Online

author: PRWEB
title: Identity Theft Insurance Quotes Added to Nationwide Database at Insurance Website Online
text:
The protection of identity and personal data is one concern that consumers now have in the digital age, and policies from leading insurers can now be Quote: d through our website Jacksonville, FL (PRWEB) July 03, 2015
American adults who are seeking more ways to protect their identity will now be able to browse and Quote: identity theft insurance through the Insurance Pros website online. The company is now listing nationwide companies in its web database that provide consumer identity protection at http://insuranceprosusa.com/business-insurance.html .
The policies that consumers will now be able to find are underwritten by select agencies throughout America that are able to expand coverage to the personal or business information of a consumer. Users of the Insurance Pros company system will need to search by providers using a zip code to be sure an agency exists in their geographic area.
"The protection of identity and personal data is one concern that consumers now have in the digital age, and policies from leading insurers can now be Quote: d through our website," said an Insurance Pros company source.
The computerized system that can be researched to find various providers at the Insurance Pros website has been revised this year to include basic, advanced, short and long-term coverage options. When a person decides to go through with obtaining a Quote: , the type and length of coverage can now be pre-selected.
"Our database will remain open to adults in the U.S. to supply access to the ever-changing listing of insurers now quoting consumer protection plans this year," said the source.
The Insurance Pros USA company recently enhanced its web interface to remove the option of entering personal information during the search process. The move to supplying insurer data through submission of a zip code is designed to make the system more private when used online.
About InsuranceProsUSA.com
The InsuranceProsUSA.com company built one of the only public databases for consumers to use to find current price information from leading insurance agencies. The company allows consumers to acquire quotations by zip code. The InsuranceProsUSA.com company adds to the public listing of providers that the public can find using its website every month of the year.
